Dumbbells with Built-in Straps: Incorporate adjustable straps for hands to help improve grip and stability during exercises.
Dumbbell Handles with Textured Grip: Add textured handles to prevent slipping, especially useful for users with sweaty hands during vigorous workouts.
Compact Design: Develop fold-up dumbbells, allowing users to easily store them more compactly, especially for space-saving purposes.
Digital Weight Display: Incorporate a digital display on dumbbells, allowing users to track their weight and set personal workout goals.
Dumbbells with Built-in Motion Sensors: Equip dumbbells with motion sensors that track user's form and movement, providing real-time feedback on adjustments needed.
